summary: This is a U.S. Marshals Service Prisoner Custody Alert Notice for Jeffrey Edward Epstein, documenting his prisoner number, charges (sex trafficking conspiracy), and a suicide alert. It indicates he was in custody as of July 18, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the prisoner custody alert notice, identified by prisoner number F 6318054, charged with sex trafficking conspiracy.

events.title: Epstein Prisoner Custody Alert
events.description: A U.S. Marshals Service Prisoner Custody Alert Notice is prepared for Jeffrey Edward Epstein, noting his charges and a suicide alert.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Edward Epstein was assigned prisoner number F 6318054 by the U.S. Marshals Service.
The formal charge listed against Epstein is 'SEX TRAFFICKING CONSPIRACY' under 18 USC 371.
The document includes a 'Suicidal Tendencies' alert, indicating mental health concerns were noted upon his custody.
The document is dated July 18, 2019, placing Epstein in federal custody at that time.
